1: <pb/><t>In nanac sic'lab'il to malaj b'aq'uin̈ sviloch in c'ol d'a eb' ix cob'estac.</t>
2: <t>Q'uinaloc sviloch in c'ol d'a eb' ix, ¿tocval man̈ ol yac' spac Dios Syal Yuj Smasanil d'ayin?</t>
3: <t>¿Tom man̈oc d'a eb' chuc yed' d'a eb' b'aj malaj yelc'och Dios sjavi yaelal?</t>
4: <t>¿Tocval max yil Dios tas tzin c'ulej yed' b'ajtac tzin eq'ui?</t>
5: <t>Svac' val in ti' to malaj mach b'aj chuc svutej in b'a, malaj b'aj ec'nac d'a in c'ol in musan sat anima.</t>
6: <t>Comonoc tzin sch'olb'itej Dios d'a stojolal icha yechtaj yalil junoc tas, yic syilani to tz'acan in vach'il.</t>
7: <t>Q'uinaloc in el d'a b'eyb'al yic tojolal, mato in nib'ejnac in c'ulej tas svilochi, mato ay tas man̈ vicoc in macnac vicoc,</t>
8: <t>tato icha chi', ch'ococab' mach slajancanel sat vavb'en, sjoyocab'q'ueta eb' tas avab'il chi' vuuj.</t>
9: <t>Q'uinaloc ay junoc ix ix, ix cuchb'anb'at in pensar, mato in maclej yelta junoc ix yetb'eyum junocxo vinac d'a sti' spat,</t>
10: <t>tato icha chi', ac'jocab' servil junoc ch'oc vinaquil yuj ix vetb'eyum, vayocab' junoc ch'oc vinaquil yed' ix.</t>
11: <t>Q'uinaloc in c'ulej juntzan̈ chi', smoj val vab'an syaelal tz'ac'jioch d'a vib'an̈ yuj eb' juez.</t>
12: <t>Tato icha chi', jaocab' in yaelal. Icha junoc nivan c'ac' satanel tastac, ichaocab' ta' tz'aj satanel tastac ay d'ayin.</t>
13: <t>Ayic stec'b'an sb'a eb' in checab' yalan d'ayin yuj tas svutej, svab' tas syal eb' chi'.</t>
14: <t>Tato man̈ ichaocta ix in c'ulej, ¿tas ol vutej voch d'a yichan̈ Dios? ¿Tas ol vutej valani ayic ol sc'anb'an d'ayin yuj tas ix in c'ulej?</t>
15: <t>Junn̈ej Dios on̈ ac'an pitzvoc d'a co nun yed' eb' in checab' chi', an̈ejtona' tz'ac'an co q'uinal.</t>
16: <t>Man̈ ton̈ejoc sviloch eb' meb'a' ay stzapan majanil, man̈ ton̈ejoc svilpaxi to malaj tas sva eb' ix ix chamnac yetb'eyum.</t>
17: <t>Ayic in va'i laj vac' yic eb' meb'a' unin ved'oc.</t>
18: <t>Icha val vuninal svutej eb' meb'a' unin chi'. In colvajn̈ej d'a eb' ix chamnac yetb'eyum.</t>
19: <t>Ayic svilani to ay eb' anima te meb'a' malaj spichul ayochi,</t>
20: <t>axo xil noc' in calnel svac' b'ojoc, svac'anoch sq'uixinaloc eb'. Yuj chi' syac' yuj diosal eb' d'ayin.</t>
21: <t>Tato ay b'aj ix vixtej junoc meb'a' unin yujto vojtac to chab'il vic yuj eb' yajal,</t>
22: <t>mac'jocab'el in c'ab' tic, elocab' vecnaj in jen̈jab' tic.</t>
23: <t>Yujto tzin xiv yac'an in yaelal Dios, yuj chi' max yal in tec'b'an in b'a d'a yichan̈, yujto te nivan yelc'ochi.</t>
24: <t>Malaj b'aj an̈ej d'a nivac b'eyumal svac'och in pensar, maj vac'och q'uen oro yipoc in c'ool.</t>
25: <t>Malaj b'aj vic'nacchaan̈ in b'a yuj in b'eyumal, ma yuj jantac tas ay d'ayin.</t>
26: <t>Svil scopopial yoc c'u yed' pax yic c'ojan q'uen uj te vach' yilji,</t>
27: <t>palta malaj b'aj elc'altac tzin tz'ub'elta in c'ab' yic tzin ch'oxan yechel to tzin tz'ub'elta sti' c'u yed' q'uen uj chi' yic svac'anem in b'a d'ay.</t>
28: <t>Q'uinaloc icha chi' svutej in b'a, smoj am val tz'ac'jioch in yaelal, yujto chab'sat am svutej in b'a d'a Dios ay d'a satchaan̈.</t>
29: <t>Malaj b'aj in tzalaj yuj yaelal sjavi d'a yib'an̈ eb' vajc'ool, ma yic sjavi chucal d'a yib'an̈ eb'.</t>
30: <t>Malaj b'aj ochnac in mul in c'anancot catab' d'a yib'an̈ eb', yic scham eb'.</t>
31: <t>Masanil eb' ayec' ved'oc, yojtac val eb' to ayic sjavi eb' ch'oc chon̈ab'il d'ayin, malaj junoc eb' maj ac'ji tas sva'a.</t>
32: <t>A eb' anima sb'eyeq'ui, maj yal in c'ol scan eb' d'a yoltac calle d'ac'valil, jacann̈ej in pat d'a eb'.</t>
33: <t>Malaj in mul syal in c'ub'aneli, icha syutej sb'a juntzan̈xo eb'. Malaj in mul elc'altac yaji,</t>
34: <t>yujto tzin xiv d'a eb' anima, talaj chuc tas syal eb' d'ayin. Maj in macoch in b'a d'a yol in pat yujto in xiv yuj tas syal eb' in c'ab' voc.</t>
35: <t>Comonoc ay mach tz'ab'an tas sval tic. A juntzan̈ sval tic yeln̈ej smasanil. Axo ticnaic tzin tan̈vej tas spac ol ac'joc d'ayin yuj Dios Syal Yuj Smasanil chi'. A tas tz'ac'jioch d'a vib'an̈ chi', comonoc vach' yaj stz'ib'chaj yuj vin̈ tz'ac'anoch d'a vib'an̈ chi'.</t>
36: <t>Tato icha chi', tzam vac'q'ue b'aj tz'ib'ab'iloch chi' d'a sjolom in jen̈jab', ma d'a in jolom icha junoc corona yic svic'anchaan̈ in b'a.</t>
37: <t>Tzam val d'a Dios yuj masanil tas ix in c'ulej, max am in q'uixvi in c'och d'a yichan̈.</t>
38: <t>Q'uinaloc ton̈ej in toc'naquec' lum luum d'a eb' ay yico', aton lum b'aj tzin munlaji,</t>
39: <t>q'uinaloc ton̈ej ix in vab'at sat tas b'aj ix munlaj eb' in munlajvum, maj in tuppaxlaj eb', a na van scham eb' yuj vejel.</t>
40: <t>Tato icha chi', q'uib'ocab' te q'uiix d'a sat in lum chi' sq'uexuloc ixim trigo, axo an̈ comon an̈c'ultac sq'uib' sq'uexuloc ixim cebada, xchi vin̈aj Job chi'.</t> <t>Aton slajvub' slolonel vin̈aj Job tic.</t>
